title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

TUESDAY OCTOBER 22, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

The Leo Moon makes for a lively time as you play sport, exercise, socialise or catch up with a special friend. Mars could heat up emotions though. So slow down and take things one step at a time.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ***

Focus your time and attention on domestic matters today Taurus. And make sure you deal with each situation – and family member – thoroughly, before you move onto the next issue.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 **

You’re in a hurry to let people know what you’re thinking and feeling today. But slow down! If you make thoughtless comments in a rush – in person and online – then you may regret it later on.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

The focus is firmly on finances, as you strive to come up with better ways to manage money. If you can’t handle it yourself, then don’t hesitate to call on the expertise of an up-to-date professional.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ***

Energy and enthusiasm are high as the Moon moves through Leo. You’re mentally alert and able to make decisions quickly but strive to be more sensitive towards the feelings of others.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ***

Today will work best if you can balance being practical and productive with being creative and compassionate. You’re busy but try to put aside some time to relax, meditate or contemplate.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ****

Be proactive about making decisions. Your motto for the day is from fellow Libran, actress and activist Susan Sarandon. “I take responsibility for the ups and downs of my life, and that is very liberating.”

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ***

Do your best to get the balance right between professional projects and spending quality time with your nearest and dearest. A colleague is looking to you for some extra emotional support.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

You’ve got a promising new project on your plate, and a lot of unfinished business too! Luckily the fiery Leo Moon gives you a welcome energy boost, so roll up your sleeves and get to work.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ***

When it comes to joint finances or shared resources, utilise your intuition to zero in on what others require. Then do some behind-the-scenes work to get things moving in the right direction.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ***

All types of partnerships – romantic, platonic and business – are highlighted at the moment. Communication flows easily but avoid jumping to conclusions. Take the time to check the facts first.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ***

You’ll make headway by keeping your eyes and ears open. Stay on top of facts and leave fantasy for the movies. Don’t be rushed into participating in a new project. Slow down and take your time.

YOUR DAY

A combination of creativity and passion will take you far but don’t rush.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You are a magnetic and charming soul. The next 12 months is the time to bring more balance into your busy world.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
